attributes.action: Create a web site tp ask the publics opinion before setting policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is there to serve the people, but asking the public in referendums is a costly way to find out what the public wants.

We ask that the government sets up a website to ask public opinion before they pass laws and other bills in parliment, and that they must listen to the results of this.

Rather than us having to petition, they should ask us first.

The cost of doing so is not high, as a developer I know this could be acheived for a very reasonable cost.
